Title: #346: How to Recession-Proof Your Business with CFO of Ramsey Solutions
Description:
Considering that we’re experiencing the longest economic expansion in United States history, Ramsey Solutions Chief Financial Officer Mark Floyd says the likelihood of an economic recession in the United States isn’t a question of “if,” but “when.” Before you go into full-on panic mode, tune in to hear Mark explain the most important numbers to track in your business and why operating without a budget is a terrible idea. Bottom line? The more you know about your business’ financial health, the better your chances of success—in or out of a recession.
